title: Yet another idea to balance U.R.F and make it worth keeping
body:
I've been reading a lot into what people like and dislike about U.R.F, and I've been looking at ideas to keep it. Here are mine =3
In order to make thing a little less one sided, adding more ban picks could help even it out. Each team at present only gets 3 picks, and in some instances its a situation where if, lets say, neither team bans Sona, in many games I've played both teams take Sona. That isn't because they want to, but in many instances because they feel the other team will pick Sona and want to fight fire with fire. If each team has say, 5 ban picks, it would allow more diversity in who is played, as well as make more OP choices a bit rarer.
I've also seen a lot of people suggesting pay to play. I think a one time payment could work, but i disagree with some of the, pay for a day similar to an IP/XP boost. I think many people would be more than happy to hand over some RP or IP to keep U.R.F. I know I would pay a few thousand RP for it. I feel it allows people who can't manage mana and cool downs to have a bit more fun playing against other people, and it really is just a fun hectic time for everyone who wants it. Even if you can't keep it in match making at least keep it in Custom, and maybe allow Custom VS Ai in URF for those who don't have friends. Thanks to anyone who took the time to read this.
I also made a poll to see if anyone thinks anything I said would work, I know sometimes I tend to get a bit non-nonsensical and wanted to know if I was making sense.

Frankly just about all the game modes with bans could use 5 on each side. We have 131 champions out right now. Banning 7.6% of the champion rooster would help diversity immensely.
